name: PortsDriver

aliases.name: Config
aliases.comment:
The `Config` record contains the output port, the input port a function to generate an error
in case of port error and a function to lift the type of messages that can arrive from the driver to
the Main Msg type.
aliases.type: { output : Json.Encode.Value -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg , input : (Json.Encode.Value -> msg) -> Platform.Sub.Sub msg , fail : String -> msg , lift : PortsDriver.Msg -> msg }

aliases.name: Driver
aliases.comment:
A record with links to the functions that can be used to generate commands
for the driver and a subscription for the replies from the driver.
aliases.type: { log : String -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg , setTitle : String -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg , updateCss : String -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg , file : PortsDriver.FileOps msg , subscriptions : Platform.Sub.Sub msg }

aliases.name: FileOps
aliases.comment:
An alias for the operations of the file. Each function takes a String `id`
that will be used to identify the input node.
aliases.type: { readAsText : String -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg , readAsDataURL : String -> Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg }

types.name: Contents
types.comment:
A union type holding the contents of the file read by the browser.
Contents read with `readAsText` and `readAsDataURL` will be received as `TextFile String`.

types.name: Msg
types.comment: The types of messages received from the driver. `File id filename contents`

values.name: install
values.comment: A function that will create the driver record.

values.name: onFileChange
values.comment: A helper for the FileReader part of the driver.
